Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in the country, the ideals he holds about the agricultural, and his ideals in regards to human nature, which was highly influenced by the Japanese war efforts in China. It also chronicles his business life that has never been written about before.<|end_of_text|>
